thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain maybank2u.com.sg is registered to Malayan Banking Berhad, which aligns with the name of a well-known bank in Malaysia and Singapore. The domain has been registered since 2000 and the registration details appear to be legitimate with contact information provided. Additionally, the domain status is "clientTransferProhibited", indicating a more secure status as it cannot be easily transferred to another registrar. The VerifiedID status is also "VerifiedID@SG-OK", suggesting that the identity has been verified according to the Singapore domain registry requirements. There are no signs of suspicious activity based on the WHOIS data. To complete the assessment, I will now retrieve the certificate information to check for proper SSL certification.
